meaningMnemonic:
The <kanji>commander</kanji> will <kanji>come</kanji> in the <vocabulary>future</vocabulary>. Not anytime soon, but in the future.

将来 generally implies the nearer, more concrete future. You’ll probably use it when discussing your career plans or a company's growth strategy, and not what the Earth will be like 100 years from now.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
